duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage budgets; profit & loss; and payables
Fill vacancies and maintain tenant waiting list
Maintain superb tenant and community relations
Responsible for HUD and Tax Credit Compliance

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree ideally with a focus in management, or 2+ years of work related experience, preferred. 3+ years of experience in Property Management, Social Work, Hotel, Hospitality or Retail management. Industry designations (COS, AHM, SHCM, TCS, ARM®, etc.) preferred. Bilingual in English and Spanish a plus.
